      • getExternalObjectId

        public String getExternalObjectId()
        If both getExternalObjectId() and getExternalObjectSystemId() are set, both must match on the same external object
        Returns:
        filter for topics which have an external object with the given external id assigned.

        If both getExternalObjectId() and getExternalObjectSystemId() are set, both must match on the same external object
        Returns:
        filter for topics which have an external object with the given system id assigned.

        the user id

      • isExcludeToplevelTopics

        public boolean isExcludeToplevelTopics()
        Returns:
        whether to exclude topics marked as top level topic from the result. If top level topics are disabled this method returns true by default. If isShowOnlyToplevelTopics() returns true this flag is ignored.

      • isForceAllTopics

        public boolean isForceAllTopics()
        Returns:
        the forceAllTopics flag. If true, all topics should be respected, regardless of access roles. The current user has to be a client manager to use this flag.

      • isIncludeChildTopics

        public boolean isIncludeChildTopics()
        Returns:
        Whether to include the child topics in the query. This parameter will only be ignored if the blogIDs parameter is unset.

      • isMultilingualTagPrefixSearch

        public boolean isMultilingualTagPrefixSearch()
        Returns:
        true if a tag prefix query should check the translations of tags

      • isRenderTagsJoin

        public boolean isRenderTagsJoin()
        Returns:
        the renderTagsJoin

      • isSearchInField

        protected boolean isSearchInField(int fieldConstant)
        Tests whether the query should search in a specific field. The field is identified with one of the SEARCH_FIELD_X constants.
        Parameters:
        fieldConstant - one of the SEARCH_FIELD_X of this class
        Returns:
        true if the constant is enabled in the search field mask set by setSearchFieldMask(int)

      • isShowOnlyRootTopics

        public boolean isShowOnlyRootTopics()
        Returns:
        Whether only root topics should be retrieved. Root topics are all topics which do not have a parent topic. Topics whose parent topics are not readable by the current user are not treated as root topics. This flag is ignored if { isShowOnlyToplevelTopics() returns true.

      • isShowOnlyToplevelTopics

        public boolean isShowOnlyToplevelTopics()
        Returns:
        True, if only topics marked as top level topic should be returned. If this flag is true, the return values of isShowOnlyRootTopics() and isExcludeToplevelTopics() will be ignored.

      • needTransformListItem

        public boolean needTransformListItem()
        returns true.
        Overrides:
        needTransformListItem in class QueryParameters
        Returns:
        true.

        Sets the blog access level
        Parameters:
        accessLevel - the access level to filter for

        public void setExcludeToplevelTopics(boolean exclude)
        Set whether to exclude top level topics from the result. This flag will be ignored if isShowOnlyToplevelTopics() returns true.
        Parameters:
        exclude - True if top level topics should be excluded.

        Parameters:

      • setMatchMode

        public void setMatchMode(org.hibernate.criterion.MatchMode matchMode)
        Sets the match mode text filtering. The default is to match anywhere.
        Parameters:
        matchMode - the matchMode to set

      • setSearchFieldMask

        public void setSearchFieldMask(int searchFieldMask)
        Can be used to set the fields to be searched with the text filter.
        Parameters:
        searchFieldMask - a bitwise combination of the SEARCH_*_FIELD flags.
        See Also:
        SEARCH_FIELD_DESCRIPTION, SEARCH_FIELD_IDENTIFIER, SEARCH_FIELD_TITLE, SEARCH_FIELD_BLOG_TAGS

      • setShowOnlyFollowedItems

        public void setShowOnlyFollowedItems(Boolean showFollowing)
        Parameters:
        showFollowing - the showFollowing to set

      • setShowOnlyRootTopics

        public void setShowOnlyRootTopics(boolean showOnlyRootTopics)
        Set whether only root topics should be returned. This flag will be ignored if isShowOnlyToplevelTopics() returns true.
        Parameters:
        showOnlyRootTopics - True if only root topics should be returned.

      • setShowOnlyToplevelTopics

        public void setShowOnlyToplevelTopics(boolean showOnlyToplevelTopics)
        Set whether only topics marked as top level topic should be returned. If set to true isShowOnlyToplevelTopics() and isExcludeToplevelTopics() will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        showOnlyToplevelTopics - True if only top level topics should be returned.

        Set aliases of tag stores to only consider tags from these stores
        Parameters:

      • setTextFilter

        public void setTextFilter(String[] textFilter)
        Set the strings to be found in title, description or identifier of blog.
        Parameters:
        textFilter - the full text strings to search for

      • setUserId

        public void setUserId(Long userId)
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id to filter for

      • showOnlyFollowedItems

        public Boolean showOnlyFollowedItems()
        Returns:
        true if only followed items are shown

      • sortByLastModificationDateAsc

        public void sortByLastModificationDateAsc()
        Sort ascending by the last modification date of the blog. This means the oldest modified blog will be returned as first element

      • sortByNameAsc

        public void sortByNameAsc()
        sort by the name of the blogs

      • transformResultItem

        public IdentifiableEntityData transformResultItem(Object resultItem)
        Transforms the BlogData. Sets the description for BlogData because the description is not allow in query (clob in a oracle db environment)
        Overrides:
        transformResultItem in class QueryParameters
        Parameters:
        resultItem - The resultItem to transform
        Returns:
        The transformed BlogData
